com.ephesoft.dcma.security.service

Interface AuthorizationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEphesoftAuthorizer, BasicAuthorizer, SSOAuthorizer, SSODatabaseAuthorizer

    public interface AuthorizationService
    Provides authorisation services required for Ephesoft.

    It provides all the services in accordance to the configuration provided in the web.xml through authenticationType parameter.

    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 18-Nov-2013

    • Method Detail

      • getUserRoles

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUserRoles(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
        Gets all the user roles available in the configured authentication type.

        It also saves the fetched user roles in the session for further use.

        Parameters:
        httpServletRequest - HttpServletRequest request attribute used to save the fetched result in session.
        Returns:
        NULL in case of errors otherwise set of user roles.

      • isSuperAdmin

        boolean isSuperAdmin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
        Checks if the current logged in user has a super-admin role or not.

        It also save the result in session for further use.

        Parameters:
        httpServletRequest - HttpServletRequest request attribute used to save the fetched result in session.
        Returns:
        false in case of errors otherwise respective result.

      • getAllSuperAdminGroup

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllSuperAdminGroup(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
        Gets all the groups which have super-admin roles assigned.

        It also saves the fetched result in the session for further use.

        Parameters:
        httpServletRequest - HttpServletRequest request attribute used to save the fetched result in session.
        Returns:
        NULL in case of errors otherwise set of groups with super-admin role.

        Returns:

        Parameters:
